trans-unit.source: Represents the information needed by an event handler to perform custom processing whenever the contents of an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le informazioni richieste da un gestore di eventi per eseguire elaborazioni personalizzate quando viene modificato il contenuto di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change within the subject <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della modifica all'interno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> eliminata.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che ha generato l’evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corresponding to the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corrispondente all’evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change within the subject <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: L'indice della modifica all'interno dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> which was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> rimossa dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> which was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> aggiunta alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che ha generato l’evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corresponding to the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> corrispondente all’evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> representing the type of change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> che rappresenta il tipo di modifica apportata.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> representing the type of change that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeAction" /> che rappresenta il tipo di modifica apportata.

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un’interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each added <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the change originating the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice della modifica all’origine dell’evento.

trans-unit.source: The index of the change originating the event.
trans-unit.target: Indice della modifica all’origine dell’evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che ha generato l’evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> which originated the event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> che ha generato l’evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un’interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> eliminata.

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of type <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> containing each removed <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> fortemente tipizzata di tipo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> che contiene ogni classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> eliminata.
